abstract: Stephen Holden reviews New York Cabaret Convention, annual showcase of nightclub talent from around the country, at Rose Hall.
snippet: The New York Cabaret Convention’s opening night on Thursday featured Christine Andreas, Barbara Carroll and Sandy Stewart, with her son Bill Charlap, among other luminaries of the genre.
lead_paragraph: The New York Cabaret Convention’s opening night on Thursday featured Christine Andreas, Barbara Carroll and Sandy Stewart, with her son Bill Charlap, among other luminaries of the genre.

headline.main: Nightclubs to Nightcaps: Celebrating a Genre
headline.print_headline: Nightclubs To Nightcaps: Celebrating A Genre
headline.seo: New York Cabaret Convention at Rose Hall - Review
